resources.string: SCORE - This text will show you how many points you have. The faster you answer the question, the more points you will receive
Qs LEFT - This will show you how many questions you have answered out of 5
TIMER - This is the countdown timer. Once the timer reaches 0, you can no longer answer the question
QUESTIONS - This is where the questions will appear
OPTIONS - This is where your options will appear. You can select one option and its bubble will turn red to show that you have selected it
CONFIRM - Once you have selected an option, you can click this button to submit your choice
You have gotten a high score!
